mapper.select: SELECT ID_ id, ACCOUNT_ account, NAME_ name, PASSWORD_ password, SALT_ salt FROM tb_user WHERE ACCOUNT_ = #{account}

SELECT DISTINCT c.url_ url, c.code_ code FROM tb_manager_role a left JOIN tb_role_menu b on a.roleId_ = b.rolenum_ left JOIN tb_menu c ON c.num_ = b.menuid_ WHERE c.isMenu_ = 0 AND a.managerId_ = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT c.url_ jump, c.code_ code, c.pcode_ pcode, c.name_ title, c.icon_ icon, c.isMenu_ isMenu, c.name_ name FROM tb_manager_role a left JOIN tb_role_menu b on a.roleId_ = b.rolenum_ left JOIN tb_menu c ON c.code_ = b.menuid_ WHERE
a.managerId_ = #{id} and c.id_ IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.levels_,c.seq_

SELECT DISTINCT c.url_ jump, c.code_ code, c.pcode_ pcode, c.name_ title, c.icon_ icon, c.isMenu_ isMenu, c.name_ name FROM tb_role a left JOIN tb_role_menu b on a.num_ = b.rolenum_ left JOIN tb_menu c ON c.code_ = b.menuid_ WHERE a.name_ = #{name} and c.id_ IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.levels_,c.seq_
